+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
[[File:Jueus ultraortodoxes satmar a brooklyn.jpg|thumb|Brooklyn's growing [[Jews|Jewish]] community is the largest in the U.S., with approximately 600,000 individuals.<ref name=BrooklynJewish>{{cite news|url=http://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/brooklyn/brooklyn-residents-jews-new-study-finds-article-1.1100080|title=Nearly one in four Brooklyn residents are Jews, new study finds|author=Simone Weichselbaum|newspaper=New York Daily News|date=June 26, 2012|accessdate=May 30, 2013}}</ref>]] :::: 49

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
 colspan="6" style="background:tan;"|'''Top publicly traded companies<br> in New York City for 2012'''<br> (ranked by revenues)<br />''with City and U.S. ranks'' :::: 36
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
| '''NYC'''|||| style="background:#ccc;"|'''corporation'''|||| style="background:#ccc;"|'''US''' 
$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
1 ::  11 
============================
 '''NYC''' 
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
 :##:  '''NYC''' 
------------
